amendatorysection.para: (2) A severe, chronic disability other than an intellectual disability or mental illness which:
(a) Is attributable to a mental or physical impairment other than a mental or physical impairment caused solely by mental illness;
(b) Is manifested before the age of twenty-two years;
(c) Is likely to continue indefinitely; and
(i) In the case of a person under three years of age, at least one developmental delay; or
(ii) In the case of a person three years of age or older, a substantial limitation in three or more of the following areas of major life activity, as appropriate for the person's age:
(B) Receptive and expressive language development and use;
